name: Avrupa Kad?n Lobisi T?rkiye Koordinasyonu
goal:
Avrupa Kad?n Lobisi T?rkiye Koordinasyonu (EWL Coordination for Turkey) is a nationwide women's platform with members from diverse parts of Turkey.
Avrupa Kad?n Lobisi T?rkiye Koordinasyonu is a national coordination tied to the European Women's Lobby.
Founded in 2004, EWL Coordination for Turkey embraces the below stated principles:

? Anti-militarist
? Anti-fascist
? Having a woman perspective
? Democrat - libertarian
? Egalitarian
? Not homophobic
? Completed its organizational structuring

General aims of the organization are;
General Aims:
? Getting involved in EU policies from a feminist perspective
? Putting public pressure to carry EU feminist agenda to Turkey
? Getting involved in Turkey?s EU membership process with a feminist perspective
? Getting involved in EU equality acquis in line with women?s movement agenda in Turkey and in the World.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Youth
